gwscattering (v0.6)¶

Utils functions to build a pipeline for scattered light noise hunting in gravitational waves detectors.

Requirements¶

  • Python 3.6+

  • numpy

  • gwpy

  • gwdetchar

  • MarkupPy

  • pytz

  • pandas

  • scipy

  • yaml

  • matplotlib

  • astropy

  • pytvfemd

Installation¶

pip install gwscattering

Documentation for the Code¶

  • helpers
  • html
  • utils
